name: Draft Realms
description:
A one versus one deck building game  where the goal is to have a final score higher than the opponent's. In turn, choose a card that strengthens your synergy or pull the rug  from under your opponent's feet.

Credits :

Clémence Maguer  (LPMJV) - artist

Antoine Babia (LPMJV) - GD

Vivien Moll (LPMJV) - GD, developer

Florentin Rollet (JIN) - developer

Mikaël Landa (LPMJV) - developer

Vincent Constantin (LPMJV) - producer

Musique : Note, par Hicham Chahidi
